comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of miter saws purchased
- y: number of circular saws purchased

Extracted Constraints:
1. 50x + 70y \geq 1500 (cut at least 1500 planks of wood per day)
2. 60x + 100y \leq 2000 (produce at most 2000 units of sawdust per day)

Objective Function:
minimize x + y (total number of saws)
